response.overview: A man fights substance abuse in an unremitting valley while stalked by an inimical demon. "Joshua's Valley" follows a lost young man as he tread through a bleak valley that reflects his depressed mental state of loss, substance abuse, and literal demons. He must overcome the valley and the antagonizing demon, Laci' Mani, in order to obtain closure and ascend towards a better life "Joshua's Valley" took an innovative approach in filmmaking, being one of the first feature films shot on a DJI Osmo Pocket 3.
response.title: Joshua's Valley
